docs.snippet: Verified Facebook pages of Elon Musk's rocket company SpaceX and electric carmaker Tesla Inc disappeared on Friday, minutes after the Silicon Valley billionaire promised on Twitter to take down the pages when challenged by users.

headline.print_headline: Musk Deletes Facebook Pages of Tesla, SpaceX After Challenged on Twitter
headline.main: Musk Deletes Facebook Pages of Tesla, SpaceX After Challenged on Twitter

docs.snippet: Investigators from Britain's data watchdog on Friday searched the London offices of Cambridge Analytica, the data analytics firm at the centre of a storm over allegations it improperly harvested Facebook data to target U.S. voters.

headline.print_headline: UK Investigators Search London Office of Firm at Centre of Facebook Data Storm
headline.main: UK Investigators Search London Office of Firm at Centre of Facebook Data Storm

docs.snippet: Authorities in the U.S. and the U.K. are bearing down on Facebook and political data-mining firm Cambridge Analytica over allegations the firm stole data from 50 million Facebook users and used it to manipulate elections.

headline.print_headline: At a Glance: Calls in US, UK to Probe Facebook, Data Firm
headline.main: At a Glance: Calls in US, UK to Probe Facebook, Data Firm

docs.snippet: MSCI Inc on Tuesday said it is looking into the possibility that Facebook Inc user data was accessed by the consultancy Cambridge Analytica.

headline.print_headline: Index Provider MSCI Says It Is Reviewing Facebook Data Privacy Issue
headline.main: Index Provider MSCI Says It Is Reviewing Facebook Data Privacy Issue

docs.snippet: EU Justice Commissioner Vera Jourova plans to discuss the alleged misuse of more than 50 million Facebook users' data with the U.S. social network and with the U.S. government on her visit to the United States this week.

headline.print_headline: EU Justice Chief to Discuss Data Leak With Facebook, U.S. Government
headline.main: EU Justice Chief to Discuss Data Leak With Facebook, U.S. Government

docs.snippet: Cambridge University said it wanted Facebook to confirm its academic Alex Kogan used no university data, resources or facilities at a time when the social network says he violated its rules by passing user information on to Cambridge Analytica.

headline.print_headline: UK's Cambridge University Questions Facebook About Academic's Role in Data Breach
headline.main: UK's Cambridge University Questions Facebook About Academic's Role in Data Breach

docs.snippet: A former Facebook operations manager told a British parliamentary committee on Wednesday that data harvesting of member profiles by outside software developers was once routine and that the company took years to clamp down on the practice.

headline.print_headline: Facebook Took Years to Clamp Down on Developers' Data Harvesting-Ex-Operations Manager
headline.main: Facebook Took Years to Clamp Down on Developers' Data Harvesting-Ex-Operations Manager

docs.snippet: Facebook Inc and the political consulting firm Cambridge Analytica have been sued in the United States for obtaining information belonging to 50 million of the social media company's users without permission.

headline.print_headline: Facebook, Cambridge Analytica Sued in U.S. by Users Over Data Harvesting
headline.main: Facebook, Cambridge Analytica Sued in U.S. by Users Over Data Harvesting

docs.snippet: U.S. lawmakers on Friday formally asked Facebook Inc's Mark Zuckerberg to explain at a congressional hearing how 50 million users' data got into the hands of political consultancy Cambridge Analytica.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Lawmakers Formally Ask Facebook CEO to Testify on User Data
headline.main: U.S. Lawmakers Formally Ask Facebook CEO to Testify on User Data

docs.snippet: Authorities in the U.S. and the U.K. are bearing down on Facebook and political data-mining firm Cambridge Analytica over allegations the firm stole data from 50 million Facebook users and used it to manipulate elections.

headline.print_headline: At a Glance: Calls in US, UK to Probe Facebook, Data Firm
headline.main: At a Glance: Calls in US, UK to Probe Facebook, Data Firm
